name: filterProjectEnvs
description: Retrieve the environment variables for a given project by passing either the project `id` or `name` in the URL.

idOrName.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

gitBranch.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable to filter the results

decrypt.description: If true, the environment variable value will be decrypted

source.description: The source that is calling the endpoint.

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.
